sections.MISSION:
2/Bull, 1st Squadron, 2d Cavalry Regiment conducts M500 shoot in daylight conditions IVO RG 122 on 01 MAR 2023 IOT build individual proficiency on secondary weapon systems.
2/BULL M500 Range
Task to Subordinate Units OIC/RSO: 1LT Villapiano
NCOIC/RSO: SFC Colon
Gate Guards: PV2 Brown, PFC Ned, PV2 Sims, SPC Kuper Fire NCOIC: SSG Haagsma Ammo NCOIC: SGT Huerta RTO: SPC Flores
Medic: SPC McClure
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
–
2/Bull will provide lane safeties and the CASEVAC vehicle (2-3).
Medics will need to provide 1x Medic.
5.
sections.CMD AND SIGNAL:
a. Command: Troop CP TBD.
b. Signal: (1) Troop CMD Net: Range Freq or IAW SQDN Commo Card (2) PLT Net: IAW SQDN Commo Card
sections.PURPOSE: – Build proficiency on soldier’s ability on M500 Shotgun.
sections.KEY TASKS:
in this phase will be proper police call of the range and positive accountability of all personnel/equipment, and clearing the land with Range Control.
4.
sections.EXECUTION: and range safety rehearsals. Phase 3: Will begin once all soldiers have completed the qualification shoot and end when the range has been cleared IAW GTA Range Standards.
